titles: The doctors medicines and counsel which he gave to a maiden or, A cloak for a gross widdow
Doctors medicines and counsel which he gave to a maiden.
publisher: Printed for J. Clark at the Harp and Bible in West-smith-field,
notes: Imprint place and and imprint date from Wing.
Verse - "Draw near young lasses that in the street passes".
